latex:
For the equation $ \frac {1 + x}{1 - x} = \frac {N + 1}{N}$ to be true where $ N$ is positive, $ x$ can have:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{any positive value less than }1 \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ \text{any value less than }1$\\
$ \textbf{(C)}\ \text{the value zero only} \qquad\textbf{(D)}\ \text{any non - negative value} \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ \text{any value}$
